blogPost.excerpt: Ever wanted to show an onboarding without code? Show a marketing message on a click of button? Now you got pal.
blogPost.body: Ever wanted to show an onboarding without code? Show a marketing message on a click of button? Now you got pal.
blogPost.title: Pal - No-code user onboarding for all your flutter apps
blogPost.author: mcfly

localize.description: 有没有想在没有代码的情况下展示一个入职培训？点击按钮就能显示营销信息？现在你有了朋友。
localize.tagline: 您所有的flutter应用程序的无代码用户上岗。

localize.description: 有沒有想在沒有代碼的情況下展示一個入職培訓？點擊按鈕就能顯示營銷信息？現在你有了朋友。
localize.tagline: 您所有的flutter應用程序的無代碼用戶上崗。

previous.excerpt: Static pages are so last year!💥 Drive user engagement, improve their experience and navigation by 21%, and increase your conversion rate with vector animation of empty states and UI icons. Get our free animations and customize them to your app design 🌈
previous.title: Product UI Animations by Awesomic - Animated graphics and icons for web and mobile app design

localize.description: 静态页面是如此的去年！💥驱动用户参与，改善他们的体验和导航21％，并增加你的转换率与空状态和UI图标的矢量动画。获取我们的免费动画，并根据您的应用设计进行定制🌈。
localize.tagline: 用于网页和移动应用设计的动画图形和图标。

localize.description: 靜態頁面是如此的去年！💥驅動用戶參與，改善他們的體驗和導航21％，並增加你的轉換率與空狀態和UI圖標的矢量動畫。獲取我們的免費動畫，並根據您的應用設計進行定製🌈。
localize.tagline: 用於網頁和移動應用設計的動畫圖形和圖標。
